titleStmt.title: The Petition of divers of His Majesties faithfull subjects, of the true Protestant religion, in the county Palatine of Lancaster presented to His Majestie at York the last of May, by the high sheriffe of that county, and divers other gentlemen of qualitie of qualitie : and subscribed by 64 knights and esquires, 55 divines, 740 gentlemen, and of freeholders and others above 7000 : with His Majesties answer, June 6, 1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
